thread.title: Jennifer Anguish
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Jennifer Anguish

author: Jennifer Anguish
title: Jennifer Anguish
text: I've been purchasing furniture from Marshall for some time now. He has always taken great care of me. He's honest and straight forward. No sales pitch here. He's works with your budget but also goes above and beyond!! Luxury living on an affordable budget!!
